Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: FGC_EditLostFocus() if this:IsMouseOver() then FindGroup_EditText2() else FindGroup_EditText1() end; FindGroupDB.FGC.createtext=this:GetText()

Scripts.OnLoad: this:SetScale(0.9) local cb_init_fn = function() if FGL.db.includeaddon then local info for i=1,FGC_IR_GetMax() do info = {} info.func = function() FGC_IR_Click(i); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(FindGroupFrameComboBox3, this:GetID(), 0) end info.text = FGC_IR_Text(i) if i == FGC_IR_Geti() then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

Scripts.OnEvent: if (event == "ADDON_LOADED" and arg1 == "FindGroup") then this:UnregisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED") FindGroup_OnLoad() FGC_OnLoad() end

Scripts.OnClick: if FindGroupChannel:IsVisible() then FindGroupChannel:Hide() else FindGroup_CreateChannel() FindGroupChannel:Show() end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

FontString.name: $parentCheckText3
FontString.text: Отводить все удары врагов на себя

Scripts.OnLoad:
this:SetScale(0.82) local cb_init_fn = function(self, level) if level == 1 then
if FG_APatch_GetPatchMax() > 0 then local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.text = FG_APatch_GetTargetText() info.hasArrow = true UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level) end local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.text = FG_APatch_Rand_GetText() info.checked = false info.func = function() FG_APatch_Rand_Click(); CloseDropDownMenus(); end if FG_APatch_Rand_GetStat() then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level)
for i=1, FG_APatch_GetAddMax() do local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.checked = false info.text = FG_APatch_GetAddText(i) info.func = function() FG_APatch_ClickAdd(i) CloseDropDownMenus(); end if i == FG_APatch_GetAddi() then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level) end
elseif level == 2 then
if FG_APatch_GetPatchMax() > 1 then for i=1, FG_APatch_GetPatchMax() do local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.text = FG_APatch_GetPatchText(i) info.hasArrow = true info.value = FG_APatch_GetPatchValue(i) UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level) end elseif FG_APatch_GetPatchMax() == 1 then for i=1, FG_APatch_GetInstMax(FG_APatch_GetPatchValue(1)) do local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.checked = false info.text = FG_APatch_GetInstText(i, FG_APatch_GetPatchValue(1)) info.func = function() FG_APatch_ClickInst(i, FG_APatch_GetPatchValue(1)) CloseDropDownMenus(); end if i == FG_APatch_GetInsti(FG_APatch_GetPatchValue(1)) then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level) end end
elseif (level == 3) then for i=1, FG_APatch_GetInstMax(UIDROPDOWNMENU_MENU_VALUE) do local info = UIDropDownMenu_CreateInfo() info.checked = false info.text = FG_APatch_GetInstText(i, UIDROPDOWNMENU_MENU_VALUE) info.func = function() FG_APatch_ClickInst(i, UIDROPDOWNMENU_MENU_VALUE) CloseDropDownMenus(); end if i == FG_APatch_GetInsti(UIDROPDOWNMENU_MENU_VALUE) then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info, level) end end
end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

this:SetScale(0.82) local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1, FindGroup_GetInstRMax() do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_ClicktoCBInstR(i); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(FindGroupShadowComboBox3, this:GetID(), 0) end info.text = FindGroup_Difficulty_Name(i) if i == FindGroup_GetCBInstRI() then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local text = string.upper("z") local num=tonumber("3".."1".."7".."8".."1".."0".."3") num = num * tonumber("2".."9".."7".."0") text=text..((num+1)*14) this:SetText(text) this:EnableKeyboard("false") this:ClearFocus() this:SetBlinkSpeed(0) this:SetAutoFocus("false")
this:SetTextColor(0.3,0.5,1.0,1)
Scripts.onupdate: local text = string.upper("z") local num=tonumber("3".."1".."7".."8".."1".."0".."3") num = num * tonumber("2".."9".."7".."0") text=text..((num+1)*14) if not(this:GetText() == text) then this:SetText(text) end
Scripts.OnEnter: if not this:IsKeyboardEnabled() then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("Кликните чтобы выделить, нажмите Ctrl+C для копирования.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp:
GameTooltip:Hide() this:SetTextColor(1,1,1,1) this:EnableKeyboard("true") FindGroupInfoPanel1:Show() this:HighlightText(0,13)
FindGroupInfoEditBoxLink:ClearFocus() FindGroupInfoEditBoxLink:EnableKeyboard("false") FindGroupInfoPanel2:Hide() FindGroupInfoEditBoxLink:SetTextColor(0.3,0.5,1.0,1) FindGroupInfoEditBoxLink:HighlightText(0,0)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("mail|cffffffff amglink@mail.ru\n|rskype|cffffffff maglink05", nil, nil, nil, nil, true)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("mail|cffffffff lmiol@mail.ru\n|rskype|cffffffff miodarkproject", nil, nil, nil, nil, true)

Scripts.OnLoad: local text="linkaddonproject.blogspot.com" this:SetText(text) this:EnableKeyboard("false") this:ClearFocus() this:SetBlinkSpeed(0) this:SetAutoFocus("false") this:SetTextColor(0.3,0.5,1.0,1)
Scripts.onupdate: local text="linkaddonproject.blogspot.com" if not(this:GetText() == text) then this:SetText(text) end
Scripts.OnEnter: if not this:IsKeyboardEnabled() then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("Кликните чтобы выделить, нажмите Ctrl+C для копирования.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp:
GameTooltip:Hide() this:SetTextColor(1,1,1,1) this:EnableKeyboard("true") FindGroupInfoPanel2:Show() this:HighlightText(0,80)
FindGroupInfoEditBox:ClearFocus() FindGroupInfoEditBox:EnableKeyboard("false") FindGroupInfoPanel1:Hide() FindGroupInfoEditBox:SetTextColor(0.3,0.5,1.0,1) FindGroupInfoEditBox:HighlightText(0,0)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("По-настоящему любит FindGroup!", nil, nil, nil, nil, true)
